subject: p12475198
Findings: Allowing for differences in technique and projection, there has been little change in the appearance of the chest since the recent study of one day earlier. Widespread heterogeneous areas of consolidation continue to affect the right lung more than the left. There has been slight worsening in the right lung base with otherwise no relevant changes.
